SACMDefinition.Workspace:
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="lace17total" multiplicity="exactlyOne" expression='if lace17 < 4 then lace17.toString() else "5"' description="Comorbities Result"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="lace19" description="LACE" uiReference="colors(0<=green<5<=orange<10<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si <= 4 Low risk (Green)|| si >= 5 i <= 9 Moderate risk (Orange)|| si >= 10 High risk of readmission (Red)" expression="number(lace1,0)+number(lace2,0)+number(lace18,0)+number(lace17total,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="ch22" expression="number(ch1,0) + number(ch2,0) + number(ch3,0) + number(ch4,0) + number(ch5,0) + number(ch6,0) + number(ch7,0) + number(ch8,0) + number(ch9,0) + number(ch10,0) + number(ch11,0)*2 + number(ch12,0)*2 + number(ch13,0)*2 + number(ch14,0)*2 + number(ch15,0)*2 + number(ch16,0)*2 + number(ch17,0)*3 + number(ch18,0)*6 + number(ch19,0)*6" description="Charlson Comorbidity Index (unadjusted)" uiReference="colors(1<=green<=2<orange<=4<red<100)"/>
<AttributeDefinition id="bodytemplate" description="Body Template" type="string" multiplicity="exactlyOne" uiReference="hidden" defaultValue="BRAINLIVERLUNGVESSELS STROKEDE LA CAMAHEARTPANCREASKIDNEYLHALeft Hip ArthroplastyRHARight Hip ArthroplastyLKPLeft Knee ProtesisRKPRight Knee Protesis #charlsonscorevar CharlsonGOODMODERATESEVERE"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="pfeiffer2" description="Pfeiffer" expression='number(pfeiffer1,0)' additionalDescription="If >= 3 suspected cognitive impairment (Red)|| If <= 2 there is no cognitive impairment (Green)" uiReference="colors(0<=green<3<=red<11<=orange<=10000)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="hadA8" description="HAD Anxiety" uiReference="colors(0<=green<8<=orange<11<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si <= 7 Normal (Verd)|| si >=8 i <= 10 Límit (Taronja)|| si >= 11 Cas anormal (Vermell)" expression="number(hadA1,0)+number(hadA2,0)+number(hadA3,0)+number(hadA4,0)+number(hadA5,0)+number(hadA6,0)+number(hadA7,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="hadD8" description="HAD Depression" uiReference="colors(0<=green<8<=orange<11<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="si <= 7 Normal (Verd)|| si >=8 i <= 10 Límit (Taronja)|| si >= 11 Cas anormal (Vermell)" expression="number(hadD1,0)+number(hadD2,0)+number(hadD3,0)+number(hadD4,0)+number(hadD5,0)+number(hadD6,0)+number(hadD7,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="barthel11" description="Barthel" uiReference="colors(0<=red<61<=orange<91<=green<=10000)" additionalDescription="If <= 20 Total dependent (Red)|| if > 20 i <= 60 Severe dependence (Red)|| if > 61 i <= 90 Moderate dependence (Orange)|| si > 91 i <= 99 Slight dependence (Verd)|| if = 100 Independent (Green)" expression="number(barthel1,0)+number(barthel2,0)+number(barthel3,0)+number(barthel4,0)+number(barthel5,0)+number(barthel6,0)+number(barthel7,0)+number(barthel8,0)+number(barthel9,0)+number(barthel10,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="fallRisk6" uiReference="colors(0<=green<3<=orange<5<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="Low risk if <= 2 (Green)|| Moderate risk if 3 or 4 (Orange)|| High risk if >= 5 and <= 9 (Red)" expression="round(number(fallRisk1,0))+round(number(fallRisk20,0))+round(number(fallRisk21,0))+round(number(fallRisk22,0))+round(number(fallRisk3,0))+round(number(fallRisk40,0))+round(number(fallRisk41,0))+round(number(fallRisk42,0))+round(number(fallRisk50,0))+round(number(fallRisk51,0))+round(number(fallRisk52,0))" description="Fall risk"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="IADL7" expression="number(IADL1,0) + number(IADL2,0) + number(IADL3,0) + number(IADL4,0) + number(IADL5,0) + number(IADL6,0)" description="ADL Score" uiReference="colors(0<=green<=0<orange<=6<red<13)"/>
<AttributeDefinition id="cr2" type="enumeration" multiplicity="exactlyOne" description="Té disfunció sistòlica entesa com una Fracció de Ejecció VI < 40%?">
<AttributeDefinition id="cr6" type="enumeration" multiplicity="exactlyOne" description="Va fer el pacient < 7 METS?">
<AttributeDefinition id="rr2" type="enumeration" multiplicity="exactlyOne" description="El/la pacient té un FEV1 <30% del valor de referència?">
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="Medication2" description="Pharmacy data Compliance" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=red<2<=orange<=10000)" additionalDescription="If 0 (Green)|| If 1 (Red)" expression="number(Medication1,0)"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="Medication5" description="Difficulty of treatment" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=orange<2<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="if 0 (Green)|| if 1 (Orange)|| if >= 2 (Red)" expression="number(Medication1,0)+number(Medication2,0)+number(Medication3,0)+number(Medication4,0)" />
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="dwelling5" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=orange<2<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="if 0 (Green)|| if 1 (Orange)|| if >= 2 (Red)" expression="round(number(dwelling1,0))+round(number(dwelling2,0))+round(number(dwelling3,0))+round(number(dwelling4,0))" description="Social housing"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="career5" uiReference="colors(0<=green<1<=orange<2<=red<=10000)" additionalDescription="if 0 (Green)||if 1 (Orange)|| if >= 2 (Red)" expression="round(number(career1,0))+round(number(career2,0))+round(number(career3,0))+round(number(career4,0))" description="Carer's capacity"/>
<CaseDefinition id="LCS3_Leida" description="CSDemo" ownerPath="LCS3_Settings.CaseManager" clientPath="LCS3_Settings.Patient" entityDefinitionId="LCS3_CaseData" newEntityDefinitionId="LCS3_Settings" newEntityAttachPath="LCS3_Settings" notesDefaultValue='
HOSPITAL EQUIP DE PRIMARIA
Gestor de casos
-editat per ... DD/MM/AAAA
Metge especialista
-editat per ... DD/MM/AAAA
Metge especialista
-editat per ... DD/MM/AAAA
Infermera
-editat per ... DD/MM/AAAA
Infermera
-editat per ... DD/MM/AAAA
Treballador Social
-editat per ... DD/MM/AAAA
' onCompleteHTTPHookURL="http://integration-producer:8081/v1/producer/point-to-point/sacm/case/terminate" onTerminateHTTPHookURL="http://integration-producer:8081/v1/producer/point-to-point/sacm/case/terminate" onDeleteHTTPHookURL="http://integration-producer:8081/v1/producer/point-to-point/sacm/case/terminate">
